pages.text: The End is a place full of oddities. While some say it is truly the end, others say that it is just the beginning. It is a name of contradicitons. Strange creatures lie within, with strange, otherworldly properties. Within the endstone, a manifestation of those very properties breaks into the cracks of the rock, and shows itself. Though it does not happen commonly.

The $(bold)$(6)Infused End Stone$() is what holds this ethereal essence. It's formation is even stranger than that of $(d)Infused Netherrack$(), as while in the Nether there is anger and hate, and the $(bold)Void$() sorrow and emptiness, in the End, there is no defined feeling or emotion to manifest... Perhaps this would change the course of all the previous theories...
The $(bold)$(6)Ethereal Dust$() is what drops from the $(d)Infused End Stone$().
The $(d)Ethereal Dust$() can be crafted into a bag for later use.
